activities: Payless Inc. is involved in the development and sale of lifestyle, fashion, and performance brands for footwear and related accessories.  Payless Inc.'s operations include Payless ShoeSource.  The data transferred by Payless Inc. includes data related to staff administration; accounts and records; advertising, marketing and public relations; membership records and crime prevention.  It includes data on customers, vendors and employees.  Payless Inc. also processes data on behalf of others including its former subsidiaries.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, Loss Prevention, Field Audit, Risk Insurance, and Privacy Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Footwear - (FOT)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)Sporting Goods & Recreational Equipment - (SPT)
personaldata: Staff Administration; Advertising, Marketing and Public Relations; Accounts & Records; Administration of Membership Records; Crime Prevention and Prosecution of Offenders.  This includes data on customers, vendors and employees.  Collective Brands also processes data on behalf of others including its former subsidiaries.
recoursemech: NIPC Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Scheme EU & Switzerland (https://sites.google.com/site/nipcarbitration/home/safe-harbor); For organization human resources data only: EU and Swiss data protection authorities (EU DPAs and Swiss FDPIC).
